title: Lifelong Learning Competency Enhancement Program for Professional Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of Fundamental Learning Skills and Intermediate Knowledge in Specialized Areas
context.additional_context: Social domain education focused on developing self-directed learning strategies using metacognition

learning_goals: Learners can apply metacognitive strategies to systematically plan and monitor the learning process
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans to solve problems occurring in professional work environments
Learners can reflectively evaluate learning outcomes and generate feedback to improve future learning strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
